meanings.definition: A place where ships are built or repaired.
meanings.sent1: The shipyards by the harbor were busy with workers constructing a new vessel.
meanings.sent2: My uncle works at the shipyards, helping to fix damaged ships.
meanings.sent3: The shipyards were so crowded that the workers had to build a ship on top of another ship!
meanings.sent4: In the vast sea of possibilities, the shipyards stood as the creators of dreams.
meanings.sent5: The shipyards echoed with the sounds of hammers and saws, bringing ships to life.

meanings.definition: The workers or the area in a shipyard.
meanings.sent1: The shipyards were filled with skilled craftsmen and laborers.
meanings.sent2: At the shipyards, the workers took pride in their ability to repair ships efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The shipyards buzzed with activity as the workers raced to finish the ship before the storm hit.
meanings.sent4: In the shipyards, the workers were the heartbeat of the maritime industry.
meanings.sent5: The shipyards were a community of dedicated individuals who brought ships back to life.
